snippet: A federal grand jury has toughened charges against three antiwar protesters who authorities say cut their way through security fences and sprayed slogans on the walls of a nuclear weapons plant.
abstract: Federal grand jury toughens charges against three antiwar protesters who authorities say cut their way through security fences and sprayed slogans on the walls of the Y-12 National Security Complex, a nuclear weapons plant, in Knoxville, Tenn;
lead_paragraph: A federal grand jury has toughened charges against three antiwar protesters who authorities say cut their way through security fences and sprayed slogans on the walls of a nuclear weapons plant.

headline.main: Tennessee: More Charges in Breach at Weapons Plant
headline.print_headline: Tennessee: More Charges In Breach at Weapons Plant
